markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Meteor Shot](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1196)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 171 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** round

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This craggy stone ammunition is warm to the touch. When you fire an activated _meteor shot,_ it explodes into a small swarm of meteors as it reaches its target, scorching nearby creatures and littering the ground with rubble. In addition to the weapon's normal damage, the meteor shot deals fire damage and the ground in the area becomes difficult terrain.

 In addition, the Strike gains the following critical failure effect.

**Critical Failure** The weapon misfires.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Meteor Shot
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 171 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 70 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ammunition deals 3d6 fire damage in a 5-foot emanation around the target (DC 23 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Meteor Shot (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 171 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 400 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ammunition deals 6d6 fire damage in a 10-foot emanation around the target (DC 29 basic Reflex save).

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Meteor Shot (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 171 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ammunition deals 9d6 fire damage in a 20-foot emanation around the target (DC 37 basic Reflex save).
name: Meteor Shot (Greater)
